head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MACLENATHEN, WILLIAM MER RICK

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MACLENATHEN, WILLIAM MER RICK

block.p: MacLENATHEN - William Mer rick. Of Danbury, CT and Mt. Sinai NY died September 18, 2000. He is survived by his wife, Carol Mansfield MacLenathen and his sister, Dr. Elizabeth James of Brooklyn. Calling at Tomlinson Homestead, 336 Main St, Danbury CT, Wednesday, 7-8:30 PM, services Thursday 11 AM at Central Christian Church, West Street, Danbury, CT.
